resources.string: This app is designed for you to stop worrying about groceries\' list and making you get full advantage of your time. Besides, one of the most common issues when going to the grocery store is that you never know whether you are carrying exact change or not. Furthermore, sometimes its to late when you realize that some product you bought was actually cheaper in other places, but how would you know? All this problems are meant to be solved by using this app. So if you are reading this, ¡congratulations! You made the right move when hitting the download button. Don\'t forget to keep track of future updates and to give us not only the negative, but also the positive feedback. Remember that your opinions help us improve our app, and eventually helps you out creating a reasonable budget and saving you not only money, but also time. Follow us on our social media (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) and stay tuned to further news and updates. Its great to have you on board! \nSincerely yours, \n The PurchaEz Team.
